thread.title: City snapshot: Booker gets green light for Londis and Budgens takeover
thread.title_full: City snapshot: Booker gets green light for Londis and Budgens takeover

title: City snapshot: Booker gets green light for Londis and Budgens takeover
text:
03 Sep 2015 | By Alec Mattinson 
The Competition & Markets Authority has cleared Booker Group’s acquisition of Londis and Budgens as Booker’s 10-week like-for-like non-tobacco sales rise 0.5%. Available to members only 
Learn more about our membership packages.
